column1: Notes: (a) Tax applies to some real estate (vacation homes). (b) Tax on the imputed rent of properties. Applies to machinery. (c) The Land Appreciation Tax is levied like a capital gains tax on the sale of property. (d) Levied by local governments. A few cities tax capital improvements.
Notes: (e) The purchaser of real property is subject to a purchase tax. (f) Nine U.S. states levy a tax on intangible personal property.
